<img src="http://srvis.com/img/logo.png" />
 
Hello LET,

It has been a while since we've advertised any virtual machine offerings, well we are back with virtual machines in our Troy, MI location. With great peering to Australia, Europe, and US. Our pricing has not changed however since our last offering, our service however has, we are providing more support than ever. 

If you have any questions do not hesitate to ask. We may run out of stock however we plan on increasing stock throughout the week for these offers. 

Thanks again!
 
 
 **1024 OpenVZ Plan in Troy, Michigan**  
 -1024MB Ram  
 -1024MB vSwap  
 -750GB Bandwidth  
 -60GB Storage  
 -2 vCPU  
 -1 IPv4 Address  
 -100Mbit/s Port  
 -SAS-70 Audited Datacenter  
 -Branded Hardware  
 -Raid-10  
 -99.9% Uptime SLA  
 -7-Day Money Back  
 -SolusVM Control Panel  
 
 **For $5.99/month.**  
 To order go to: http://srvis.com/vm.php  
 **Or for $7.00/month get double the ram! (LET SPECIAL PLAN)**  
 https://srvis.com/portal/cart.php?a=add&pid=147
 
 
 **Contact Us:**  
 Email: sales@srvis.com  
 Ticket: http://srvis.com/portal/submitticket.php  
 
 We accept PayPal or Credit Cards (Processed Separately from PayPal)  


Regards,
Travis Waye
